name: Superfood Hydrating and Nourishing Facial Oil
about: What it is:A nutrient-rich facial oil that visibly brightens, firms, and hydrates with a unique blend of antioxidant-rich oils to reveal a healthy-looking glow..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:- Flaxseed Oil: Soothes and seals in moisture, improving skin tone and hydration..What Else You Need to Know:A luxurious, award-winning facial oil with a unique blend of nine superfood oils that boost radiance and lock in moisture. Light, non-greasy and easily absorbed, this nourishing facial oil visibly plumps and smooths, minimizing the look of dullness and enhancing skin radiance for a glowing complexion..Clinical Results:In a consumer perception study with 30 subjects, after 4 weeks:
ingredients: -Flaxseed Oil: Soothes and seals in moisture, improving skin tone and hydration. .-Daikon Radish: Readily absorbs into skin, deeply nourishing and softening feel of skin. .-Broccoli Seed Oil..Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Flax) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Papaver Orientale (Poppy) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Squalane, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Seed Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Oil, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Cymbopogon Martini (Palmerosa) Oil, Geraniol, Linalool, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Farnesol, Citral, Benzyl Salicylate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use every morning after cleansing. .-Massage three to four drops over the face and neck. .-If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse out any remaining product..-Recycle jar, inner lid, and outer packaging according to local recycling guidelines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I implemented this product into my nightly routine as I was skeptical of using oil on my oily skin. It has been great! It is really hydrating but doesn't leave my skin oily or greasy at all. It soaks in nicely and doesn't have a bad scent to it. I even brought it on my vacation with me and I only ever bring products I love with me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this facial oil so much u2018t skin has never felt so amazing. I got it as a free product to test and Iu2019m in love with it

reviews.review_title: Elmis oil: lightweight, hydrating, and nourishing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Elmis Superfood Hydrating and Nourishing Facial Oil for a few weeks now, and I'm absolutely thrilled with the results. This facial oil has become a staple in my skincare routine.   First off, the texture is incredibly light and non-greasy, which is perfect for my combination skin. It absorbs quickly, leaving my face feeling soft, smooth, and deeply hydrated. The blend of superfoods in this oil, like broccoli seed oil and flaxseed oil, really works wonders. My skin looks visibly brighter and more radiant.  I also appreciate the subtle, fresh scent u2013 it's not overpowering, just a pleasant hint of natural botanicals. Iu2019ve noticed a significant improvement in my skinu2019s overall texture and tone. It feels more balanced and nourished, and even some dry patches I used to struggle with are now gone.  Overall, Elmis Superfood Hydrating and Nourishing Facial Oil is a fantastic product that delivers on its promises. Itu2019s made a noticeable difference in my skinu2019s health and appearance, and I canu2019t recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last week. I can tell my skin has become softer and isnu2019t so dried out. It is quite oily so I had to get use to that and the smells. Donu2019t normally put scented products on face but I got use to it because of how great it made my face look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was an insitivised product. I love the smell and the effectiveness. Tge packaging is great. Great for sensitive  skin. Smooths my lines cery light

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product through Influenster* Iu2019ve been using the Elemis facial oil as the final step of my skincare routine for the past two weeks and I can honestly say I really enjoy this product. Itu2019s hydrating and luxurious without being too heavy on the skin. I also love the way it smells, so refreshing almost like the oils used in yoga studios! The scent is also not too overpowering imo and has not been irritating to my skin so far. It also works well under my makeup and looks so nice especially if youu2019re going for the dewey look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this oil for a little over two weeks and itu2019s been really fantastic. I use it as a step in my night time routine. It soaks in and isnu2019t too heavy. Overall it immediately took care of all drier skin and over all my skin looks healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This facial oil is a new favorite of mine. Itu2019s lightweight, nourishing, and only takes about 4 drops to really hydrate my skin. I love the gorgeous grounding scent on it too!! Iu2019ve been using it after serums and moisturizers as the final step in my skincare routine, and wake up with super nourished skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is legit. Elemis products are on the expensive side, but I feel like they provide better results. This oil is amazing if you have dry or combo irritated skin. I use it at night over my moisturizer and wake ip

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve found my perfect night time oil. I was gifted this product for free by Elemis , but have since been incorporating it into my nighttime routine. Iu2019ve noticed more supple skin, a softer appearance and overall more hydration. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is surprisingly great for people with oily skin who tend to overproduce. Since using, my skin has been much less shiny and yet more hydrated and supple. It doesnu2019t have a strong odor in my opinion. A little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this facial oil very good too for the charllote tilbury oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This facial oil is amazing! It smells so good and feels great on my skin. I love ending my routine with it and it leaves my skin feeling so smooth and hydrated. Iu2019ll definitely be getting another after it runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy using oils on my skin.  I love the texture of this product. It is very nourishing and hydrating.  Leaves skin soft and smooth.  Especially good for dry skin types

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing facial oil! I have oily spins. I typically stay away from any type of oil-based products, especially face oil. This one is very powerful and very concentrated. You only need about two drops and that is more than plenty to go on your entire face. It has a beautiful natural fragrance. And a super lightweight and non greasy. It absorbs into the skin super quickly. It minimizes the look of dullness and enhances skin radiance for a glowing complexion.Highly concentrated, it is formulated with a blend of 9 Superfood Oils including Broccoli, Rosehip, Flaxseed and Daikon Radish to feed the skin. My skin looks so youthful hydrated and even my tone looks better in the morning. Does facial oil is packed with nine nutrient-rich vitamins and antioxidants So very much like a superfood that you would take for your body but for your skin. When I use this in my night time routine, it feels like such a luxurious calming experience with the natural chamomile almost lavender-like fragrance. Very much spa-like!

This facial oil has become my favorite product in my skincare routine. After each use, my skin feels so hydrated and refreshed! It also has a pleasant smell and leaves my skin so glowy! I use it in the morning and at night to keep my skin hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve truly been loving this facial oil! Itu2019s easily become my go-to when Iu2019m wanting hydration without the weight. It has such a fresh, light scent to it which is great for my sensitive nose. I typically only have to use 3 drops in the morning for my whole face so I see this bottle lasting me a while. In the evening, I do 4 drops. The oil glides nicely across my skin so I donu2019t get those heavy oily patches Iu2019ve gotten with some facial oils. Itu2019s like as soon as you touch your skin the oil just sits. Definitely not a problem with the Superfood Facial Oil! My usually dry skin is in love, and Iu2019m excited to pair this with my routine in the cooler months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: An amazing facial oil, thatu2019s lightweight and quick absorbing that doesnu2019t feel heavy or greasy! I use it as the last step to my morning and evening skincare routine. I love the instant healthy glow and velvety soft feel I get after applying it. I've definitely seen an improvement in the overall texture and elasticity of my skin, using it for a few weeks! It also has a lovely botanical scent, which is such a mood elevator!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This facial oil is really nice and leaves my hand feeling very soft. I like to use it at night only because i don't like using the oils under makeup during the day. It could probably be used in VERY limited amounts during the day / under makeup. Overall have been really into this product.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s be great without the added fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After HATING the Elemis Marine Cream & SPF products, I had low expectations for anything else from the brand, but this facial oil is actually quite lovely. Lightweight, absorbs well, very softening & in cute little glass bottle, so that was a pleasant surprise. It smells pretty good, but my one complaint is that the ingredient list verifies thereu2019s added u201cfragranceu201d & I canu2019t find any information about whether the added fragrance is natural or artificial. Since Elemis is not a u201ccleanu201d brand & theyu2019re not promoting it as natural, itu2019s pretty safe to assume itu2019s artificial fragrance, which Iu2019m not a fan of. I donu2019t risk dabbling in possible endocrine disruptors, so I wonu2019t continue using this oil. We really need better ingredient transparency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this superfood serum is very moisturizing and hydrating !!!! i use amany different serums and oils and this one is great for morning and night time use, itu2019s lightweight but moisturizes so amazingly i would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thrilled with this facial oil's texture and fragrance. It glides on effortlessly and doesn't leave a heavy or greasy residue. The scent is pleasantly subtle, not overpowering. I'm eager to see the long-term benefits for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best product for before bedtime and to use when using a facial razor. Doesnu2019t feel too greasy so I can apply even before leaving the house! Has a nice scent that is very subtle! Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It worked very good with my skin. If felt hydrated and very moisturized. I felt like my skin was glowing after using it. I used this oil second to last in my skincare routine! So overall this oil was amazing for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is very moisturizing and doesnu2019t leave my skin feeling tacky and oily. It seeps through the skin and you can feel that it doesnu2019t just sit on the surface of your skin. I would definitely purchase this again when I run out. The only thing I didnu2019t love was the scent lingered a lot and I wasnu2019t particularly fond of that. I use this to guasha and when I need an extra boost of moisture.

This is my holy grail product in my skin care routine! After using for a while I have seen SUCH a big improvement in my skin. My skin is more glowy, more hydrated, and feels smoother and firmer! 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This superfood facial oils has done wonders to my uneven dry skin. I use it after cleaning and massage it into my face. I always notice dead skin coming off and that my face is so much softer and brighter afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently introduced gua sha massage to my night time routine and was in need of a face oil to help the tool glide. elemis oil worked out great. It is not too oily and feels great on the skin. It helps improve firmness and elasticity of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this oil! Perfect for a sleep time hydration. The smell is great and application doesn't feel too oily or heavy. My skin feels silky soft, replenished with moisture, and hydrated. This oil has done wonders for my skin that has never looked more healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite face oil!! Iu2019ve been looking for one that I can put on before I go to sleep that doesnu2019t transfer onto my pillow cases and this is it! I use it at night and wake up in the morning with very hydrated skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product!! I feel like the price great with how much product you receive and use for each application. I really enjoy the packaging, it doesnu2019t leak and the dropper application is my personal favorite. I have sensitive, dry skin and I had zero irritation! I used this for derma planing as well as hydrating serum day and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Elemis Superfood Facial Oil is a fantastic addition to my skincare routine. Packaged in a sleek green bottle with a precise dropper, it feels luxurious and eco-friendly. The oil is rich in antioxidants from superfoods like broccoli seed and flaxseed oils. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling soft, hydrated, and noticeably more radiant. Perfect for a healthy, glowing complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this! this make my face not oil but soft and smooth and Iu2019m throughly impressed by its effects! My skin has never felt more supple and the it keeps my skin hydrated all day! I would definitely recommend using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing , i love how it hydrates my skin and give a nice glow.You just need few drops. It smells good too, and the good part is ,it is doesn't make your face sticky. It is just perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put the oil on before applying makeup and wow my foundation looked so good! This oil gave my makeup a cute dewy look and made my skin super soft as well. Definitely recommend! It also left my skin feeling so smooth and radiant which I loved

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received something in exchange for this post   **Product:** Elemis Superfood Facial Oil **Rating:** 4.5/5 stars **My Experience:** I've been using the Elemis Superfood Facial Oil for a few weeks now, and I'm absolutely loving it!   This luxurious oil is packed with a blend of powerful antioxidants, vitamins, and superfoods that leave my skin feeling nourished, hydrated, and radiant.   **Key Ingredients:** * Chlorella (a type of algae) to detoxify and soothe the skin * Rosehip oil to regenerate and improve skin texture * Green tea extract to protect against environmental stressors * Vitamin E to moisturize and nourish   **How it works:** I apply a few drops of the oil to my face and neck after cleansing and toning, and massage it in gently. The oil absorbs quickly, leaving no residue or greasiness behind. I can feel it working its magic as it deeply nourishes and hydrates my skin, leaving it feeling smooth and supple.   **Pros:** * Fast-absorbing and non-greasy formula * Leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated * Rich in antioxidants and vitamins to combat signs of aging * Suitable for all skin types (even sensitive skin) **  Cons:** * A bit pricey (around $70 for 30ml) * Not suitable for acne-prone skin (due to some comedogenic ingredients)   **Overall:** The Elemis Superfood Facial Oil is a wonderful addition to my skincare routine. It's perfect for those looking for a luxurious, nourishing oil that delivers real results. While it may be on the pricier side, I believe it's worth the investment for the quality and effectiveness of the ingredients.

It feels smoother, looks more radiant, and has a noticeable firmness.  Overall, the Elemis Facial Oil Spray is a luxurious, effective product that enhances my skin's health and radiance. reviews.review_title: Heart dropped, but was VERY pleasantly surprised
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item complimentary from Influenster, in return for an honest review.  I won't lie, my heart dropped when I opened the box and saw that it was facial oil.  I have a love/hate relationship with facial oil, as they're either easy to dispense and leave my skin soft, or a drop and a half plus a night of sleep leaves me waking up, looking like I haven't showered in a month.  Additionally, my skin cannot tolerate green tea extract, and green usually equals extract.  So, I approached this with a side eye and heavy heart, knowing I at least had to TRY it for a review.  I must say, aside from my beloved Skin & Co. Truffle Therapy oil, this us now a solid #2 in my repertoire.  I go all out with my skincare routine (though I only use the oil in the evening): twice a day, it's wash/tone/spot treat/serum/moisturize (and this is at night, so I'm wearing a heavy moisturizer), and I'm happy to report that this one comes down on the love side if the scale.  It's easy to dispense, absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling like a baby's.  As long as I put my hair back for a minute to let it soak in, I don't get the weird, oily strings of hair in front like I do with a lot if oils.  It's good enough, that  Elemis is now on the list of must try brands once my skincare stash gets low.  If you're an oil user (and/or want the hydration but not loom like you slept under a leaky oil pan), do yourself a favor and give this a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! There are so many good things to say, it's definitely a 20/10... I just loved it! Let me start by saying that the smell is fantastic, subtle and elegant; the consistency of the oil is perfect for easy distribution on the face and neck. The application instructions suggest using 3 or 4 drops, but the reality is that you need 6 drops for a full massage over the entire area. Massage for a few minutes... this step became my favorite; it's so enjoyable to start the day with this delightful aroma massage. Afterward, my skin is left with a spectacular glow, no greasy complexion or annoying shine. This oil gives you just the right touch of glow that will make your skin look healthy and full of life. I've been using the product for two weeks and I really saw improvements not only in the appearance of my skin but also felt improvements in firmness and softness. It improved the appearance of my pores, giving me smoother and more even skin. And sometimes I would get small pimples on my chin, since I started using this oil my skin is free of those imperfections. After two weeks of daily use, the bottle is still more than half full, so I estimate that the product should last about three or four months, so it's really worth paying for it. Without a doubt, I will make it a must-have in my skincare routine.

The glass applicator makes getting the right amount of product in the right places so easy. I have been using this every night as part of my nighttime skincare routine and even just using this for two weeks I can already notice a difference in my skin. Iu2019ve not only noticed smoother, more hydrated skin, but Iu2019ve even been able to skip wearing foundation because this oil makes my skin looks so glowy and clear. Pores? Whou2019s she!? I do want to note that the facial oil does have a strong scent (to me, Iu2019m getting rosemary vibes) so if youu2019re not okay with strong smelling skincare, you might want to skip this one. reviews.review_text: Iu2019m starting guasha facial so I use this oil as a serum base, it does work well , it has a pleasure smell.

reviews.review_text: I love the way this oil smells! Itu2019s so earthy and herbal. Itu2019s well hydrating when you are having a dry skin day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This facial oil is night and lightweight. It doesnu2019t feel heavy or greasy on the skin. It has a herbal scent that Iingers, so that could be a turn off if you donu2019t like the scent. I like it mix 2-3 drops into my moisturizer at night if Iu2019m feeling extra dry. My skin feels nice and silky after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this oil for free from Influencer in exchange of my honest review. This product is amazing. I used it at night after cleansed face and neck, it left me with a hydrated skin right after use. Even though it is an oil, it leaves a nice smooth texture and doesnu2019t feel greasy or heavy. Its scent reminds me of herbs. I absolutely liked this product and will continue to use it in my skincare routine. I also use it under my make up routine and it adds a slightly glow to your skin. I loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influencer in exchange for an honest review. Unfortunately this product was not for me. I have acne prone skin and after one week of using this daily, I broke out like crazy. I changed nothing else in my routine but add this. I really wanted to like this but I will try other items from this company.

reviews.review_title: Leaves skin well-moisturised, a must have for dar!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from #influenster and #Elemis in exchange my honest reviews. After using this product for last couple weeks.  I noticed my skin looks younger and refreshed Smells botanical and I enjoy it. I have a dry skin so I use 3-4 drops on my face and smooth in. This absorbs into the skin extremely well and wears well under make up, especially under the eyes. I actually opt to use this instead of moisturizer because it gives my skin what its needs without leaving a residue on top. My skin has never been so soft and glowing. Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments. 10/10 WOULD recommend. This is a must buy, wears BEAUTIFULLY under makeup and really helps with dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The oil has a clear, smooth texture that glides effortlessly onto the skin. Despite being lightweight, it provides excellent hydration. As someone with dry skin, I found it absorbed quickly with just a few drops, leaving my skin incredibly soft. I woke up to beautifully hydrated skin the next morning. However, the fragrance, while fleeting, may not be suitable for those sensitive to scents. If you prefer unscented products, this may not be the best option for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for hydration, youu2019re in the right place! This serum is light and non-greasy, but also super hydrating! I love the way it makes my skin feel and the glow that it gives me! Only complaint is the scent is a bit strong for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tends to be dry and I am always in need of hydration. After using this facial oil, my skin has been feeling hydrated and dewy. The lightweight texture is a game-changer, leaving no greasy residue so I can use it both at night and in the morning. This oil has become a staple in my beauty routine, and I'd highly recommend this.

reviews.review_title: Not ideal for my sensitive face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this product was not for me. The smell is extremely strong and it was noticeable to those around me. The silky texture is lovely, but the product left a burning sensation. Tried for four days to see if my skin would settle down and it did not. I like the idea of this product but it's just not for me. *Product was sent to my by Influenster for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face oil is very hydrating and good for any skin type! I think combo skin would benefit as it would balance! This was incentivized and sent to me from Influenster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I wanted to love this so bad since I really love some other Elemis products on the market but my skin just did not agree with it. After every use the skin around my eyes would swell up. I didnu2019t apply it around my eyes, of course, but it still continued to happen only there, after each use. And I donu2019t have necessarily sensitive skin so I thought that was strange. The product consistency is just ok too. While it is an oil I feel like it dried so quickly, way before I was even able to disperse it around my skin. The scent is also really, really strong. I have no issues with fragrance but this one is just a little overpowering. Itu2019s a fresh scent, but not one I personally want smelling so strongly on my face. While I wanted to love it, itu2019s definitely not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Elemis Superfood Facial Oil! It feels soo good on the skin! My face immediately felt more hydrated, especially with the harsh of winter. I really liked how clean it smelled as well! I would highly suggest this to anyone looking for a little extra moisture in their skin! Such a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the idea of this product. However, I was not able to try it as I am allergic to rosemary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this oil absorbs nicely and is hydrating without sitting like a mask. The scent is herbal - like green tea. This is comparable to Kiehlu2019s midnight recovery oil, which I also love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great oil. Iu2019ve been layering it over my tretinoin and applying at night to fight off winter dryness. Itu2019s a nice texture without being overly greasy.
